title: What can I do if I can't access the Internet after my mobile network is turned on?
answer:
l   Make sure your SIM card is properly inserted. For details, see your phone's Quick Start Guide.

l   Make sure your phone supports the SIM card mode. For details, contact your service provider.

l   Make sure you have subscribed to a data plan for your SIM card. For details, contact your service provider.

l   Make sure your SIM card has sufficient balance. Your service provider may stop providing Internet access to SIM cards that have a negative balance.

l   Go to the **Settings** screen, and touch **More...** > **Data usage** to check whether you have set a limit for data usage. If so, you will not be able to use data services when the limit is met. Remove the limit or set a greater value.

**Figure 1-1 **

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111755800001.gif)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111755653002.gif)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111755733003.gif)

l   Restore the APN settings to their default values.

Go to the **Settings** screen, touch **Mobile networks** > **Access Point Names**, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111756574004.gif) > **Reset to default**, and then try again.

**Figure 1-2 **

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111756417005.gif)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111756967006.gif)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111756691007.gif)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111756967006.gif)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924111756739008.gif)

Note: The figures are for your reference only. Actual screens may vary slightly.
